item.title: 2025 年英国消费者将节省生活必需品，大肆举办活动
item.description: 周二的一项研究显示，2024 年英国信用卡和借记卡支出几乎没有增长，因为谨慎的消费者在购买小件奢侈品、听音乐会和旅游的同时减少了食品和大件商品的购买，这为工党政府的增长雄心提供了一个警示信号。【原文：UK credit and debit card spending barely grew in 2024 as cautious consumers treated themselves to small luxuries, concerts and travel while cutting back on food and big-ticket purchases, according to research Tuesday that provides a warning sign for the Labour government’s growth ambitions.】

item.title: 展望 2025 年，石油市场将出现轻微年度亏损
item.description: 在窄幅震荡数月之后，石油市场面临着未来一年动荡不安的前景，全年将出现小幅亏损。【原文：Oil headed for a small annual loss after months locked in a narrow trading range, with the market facing the prospect of a turbulent year ahead.】

item.title: 政治风波蔓延，韩国通胀率上升
item.description: 由于政治动荡对本币造成压力，韩国的消费通胀速度加快，威胁到这个严重依赖进口食品和能源的国家的物价稳定。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation gained pace as political turmoil weighs on the local currency, threatening price stability in a country heavily reliant on imports for food and energy.】

item.title: 融资成本创新高，港元创 2021 年以来最强势
item.description: 由于年底需求激增，港元短期借贷成本创下历史新高，港元汇率攀升至三年半以来的最强水平。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar climbed to its strongest level in three and a half years, thanks to a year-end surge in demand that pushed the currency’s short-term borrowing costs to a record high.】

item.title: 华尔街股市下跌，亚洲股市开盘疲软：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市因科技行业疲软而连续第三天扩大跌幅之后，亚洲股市有望低开。【原文：Asian shares are poised to open lower, after stocks extended losses for a third day on Wall Street due to weakness in the tech sector.】

item.title: 投资者关注 2025 年风险，石油看涨押注创四个月新高
item.description: 在 2024 年倒数第二周，看涨石油的押注达到了四个月来的最高点，因为投资者为唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的新一年做好了准备。【原文：Bullish oil bets reached a four-month high in the penultimate week of 2024 as investors position for a new year that will see Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: Big Lots 的新拯救协议因债权人反对而岌岌可危
item.description: 在一些债权人提出抱怨后，一项防止 Big Lots 公司关闭其所有门店的新提案面临风险，这些债权人将在这家陷入困境的零售商破产时蒙受损失。【原文：A new proposal to prevent Big Lots Inc. from shutting all its stores is at risk following complaints from some creditors that stand to incur losses in the troubled retailer’s bankruptcy.】

item.title: 财政部的精英债券交易商将很难处理 50 万亿美元的债务
item.description:
随着美国债务膨胀，那些在确保最大债券市场正常运作方面发挥重要作用的公司警告说，压力有可能越来越大。【原文：

As US debt balloons, firms that play a vital role in ensuring the biggest bond market works properly warn of the risk of growing pressures.

】

item.title: 火灾隐忧加剧，加州允许在费率中计入再保险费用
item.description: 加利福尼亚州批准了让保险公司在制定费率时考虑再保险费用的新规定，这是监管改革的最后一个重要步骤，其目的是在人们对野火的担忧日益加剧的情况下阻止承保人外流。【原文：California approved new rules that let insurers account for reinsurance costs when they set rates, the last major step in a regulatory overhaul designed to halt an exodus of carriers amid rising concern over wildfires.】

item.title: 美国财政部称遭到中国国家支持的黑客攻击
item.description: 美国财政部在周一致国会的一封信中说，美国财政部被中国国家支持的黑客通过第三方软件服务提供商入侵。【原文：The US Treasury Department was hacked by a Chinese state-sponsored actor through a third-party software service provider, the agency said in a letter to Congress on Monday.】

item.title: ADM 股东要求首席执行官离职，调查仍在继续
item.description: 自 Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司披露对其会计实务的调查以来，已经过去了将近一年的时间，该公司是全球最大的农产品贸易商之一，此次调查导致其损失 120 亿美元。【原文：It’s been almost a year since Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. disclosed a probe into its accounting practices that wiped out $12 billion from one of the world’s largest agricultural commodities traders.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉法院因致命挑战对 TikTok 罚款 1000 万美元
item.description: 最近几个月，TikTok 病毒挑战导致三名儿童死亡，数十人受伤，委内瑞拉最高法院对 TikTok 处以 1 千万美元的罚款。【原文：Venezuela’s top court imposed a $10 million fine on TikTok over viral challenges that killed three children and injured dozens of people in recent months.】

item.title: First Eagle 计划在米勒领导下推出第三只小额债券基金
item.description: 据向美国证券监管机构提交的一份文件显示，First Eagle Investments 计划在其高收益市政信贷团队负责人约翰-米勒（John Miller）的领导下推出第三只市政债券基金。【原文：First Eagle Investments plans to launch its third municipal-bond fund under John Miller, the head of its high-yield municipal credit team, according to a filing with US securities regulators.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织审查阿根廷 440 亿美元贷款，迈出新政关键一步
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织执行董事会将于下月审查阿根廷目前价值 440 亿美元的援助计划，这是阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）就新贷款进行谈判的关键一步。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board is set to review Argentina’s current $44 billion aid program next month, according to people familiar with the matter, a crucial step as President Javier Milei negotiates for a new loan.】

item.title: 2025 年将是难以规划的一年
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 尼日利亚称第二座炼油厂在耗资 8.98 亿美元进行改造后开始运行
item.description: 国有的尼日利亚国家石油公司（Nigeria National Petroleum Co.【原文：State-owned Nigeria National Petroleum Co. said its second refinery in the southern city of Warri is now running, providing a major boost to a nation seeking to wean itself from expensive fuel imports.】

item.title: 2024 年巴西因财政忧虑而领跌全球
item.description: 由于人们对总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）修复不断膨胀的预算赤字的承诺越来越持怀疑态度，巴西资产有望在今年年底落后于所有主要同行，雷亚尔将出现自2020年大流行病冲击以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Brazilian assets are on track to close the year lagging all major peers, with the real set for its biggest slump since the pandemic shock of 2020 amid mounting skepticism over President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s commitment to fix a ballooning budget deficit.】

item.title: 普京将 InBev Efes 俄罗斯分公司的控制权交给当地集团
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）已将安海斯-布希-英博（Anheuser-Busch InBev）合资企业的控制权交给一家当地公司，阻止这家全球最大的啤酒制造商退出俄罗斯。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has given a local company control of Anheuser-Busch InBev’s joint venture, preventing the world’s biggest brewer from exiting the country.】

item.title: 在线票务市场 Vivid Seats 正在探索出售业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，2021年通过空头支票工具上市的在线票务市场Vivid Seats公司在收到收购意向后，正在探讨出售事宜。【原文：Vivid Seats Inc., the online ticketing marketplace that went public through a blank-check vehicle in 2021, is exploring a sale after receiving takeover interest, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国能源部长格兰霍尔姆谈拜登能源转型的政治持久性
item.description:
有多少将继续下去？【原文：

How much will carry on?

】

item.title: 阿达尼绿色公司首席执行官阿米特-辛格将卸任，担任集团新职务
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd. ）首席执行官阿米特-辛格（Amit Singh）在周一提交的一份文件中表示，他将从 3 月 31 日起辞去目前的职务，在集团内部担任新的领导职务。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd.’s Chief Executive Officer, Amit Singh, will step down from his current role with effect from March 31 to assume a new leadership assignment within the conglomerate, the company said in a filing Monday.】

item.title: 美国股市将于1月9日卡特悼念日休市
item.description: 美国股市将于 1 月 9 日关闭，以纪念前总统吉米-卡特的全国哀悼日。【原文：US stock markets will close Jan. 9, in observance of a national day of mourning for former President Jimmy Carter.】

item.title: 国债收益率从上周高点回落，延续反弹势头
item.description: 周一，美国国债反弹，扭转了近期的连续跌势。【原文：US Treasuries were rallying Monday, reversing a run of recent losses as the year’s second-to-last day got underway in quiet trading.】

item.title: 投资者致肯-格里芬多策略基金仍在蓬勃发展
item.description: Citadel 创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）上个月说，多策略对冲基金的繁荣 "来了又走了"，他只说对了一半。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin was only half right last month when he said the multistrategy hedge fund boom had “come and gone.”】

item.title: 美国未决房屋销售升至 2023 年初以来最高水平
item.description: 由于购房者放弃了降低借贷成本的希望，11 月份美国房屋待售量连续第四个月增长，达到 2023 年初以来的最高水平。【原文：Pending sales of US homes increased for a fourth month in November to the highest level since early 2023 as homebuyers gave up hopes for lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 泛欧交易所称，私募股权交易将在 2025 年推动 IPO 市场发展势头
item.description: 泛欧证券交易所（Euronext NV）对明年的首次公开募股持乐观态度，因为私募股权基金正越来越多地将目光投向股票市场，以退出其拥有的企业。【原文：Pan-European stock exchange Euronext NV is upbeat about initial public offerings next year as private equity funds are increasingly looking to equity markets to exit the businesses they own.】

item.title: 美国天然气期货飙升 20%，因 1 月份气温较低
item.description: 美国天然气期货飙升，原因是一月份的天气展望转冷，提高了用于供暖和发电的燃料的需求前景。【原文：US natural gas futures soared as the weather outlook for January shifted colder, raising demand prospects for the fuel used in heating and power generation.】

item.title: 贝莱德的比特币基金成为 "ETF 历史上最伟大的发行 "之一
item.description: 贝莱德公司的 iShares 部门在全球提供 1,400 多只交易所交易基金，但没有一只基金的表现能与之媲美。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s iShares unit offers more than 1,400 exchange-traded funds around the world, yet none of them have performed quite like this.】

item.title: 英伟达完成对以色列软件初创公司 Run:ai 的收购
item.description: Nvidia 公司已完成对以色列初创公司 Run:ai 的收购，该公司获得的软件可帮助智能计算设备的所有者最大限度地利用其硬件。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has completed the acquisition of Israeli startup Run:ai, gaining software that helps owners of intelligence computing gear get the best out of their hardware.】

item.title: 中国 CTG 据称将签署收购 Northleaf 西班牙太阳能发电厂的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国三峡集团已同意从加拿大 Northleaf Capital Partners Ltd.手中收购西班牙一座 494 兆瓦的太阳能发电厂。【原文：China Three Gorges Corp. has agreed to buy a 494-megawatt solar plant in Spain from Canada’s Northleaf Capital Partners Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
